name: GRAVITON ALPHA
description:
• Simple arcade style game to use only Left and Right key inputs. (or A / D keys) 
  • Graviton Alpha contains 15 levels ( version 2021Dec24) .
    • The levels might be added if the game got donation or sales for its further development. (The price could be changed when the level was added)
  •  Graviton Beta is free playable version for 10 levels  (version 2021Dec24). 
    • Playable on iOS devices ( Left and Right movement by touching screen)
    • The levels might be added if Graviton Alpha got more levels.
  • Notes
    • Your record (score) is displayed after finishing all levels. 
      • The smaller number is the better record.
    • The record is not saved in the game, so screenshot is recommended.
    • Recording video by OBS etc might be even better if this title was added at www.speedrun.com
